name: Unicode.UTF8.ReverseParser
desc: A type that can be used to parse a reversed sequence of CodeUnits into EncodedScalars.

items.name: typealias Unicode.UTF8.ReverseParser.Encoding
items.desc: The encoding with which this parser is associated

items.name: init()
items.desc: Constructs an instance that can be used to begin parsing CodeUnits at any Unicode scalar boundary.
